TextAsset.value: It’s pretty nice up here.
I didn’t know you were such a romantic!
of course i am this is a dating sim
if i wasnt a romantic itd be kind of a ripoff right
You know, your insane rambling really takes the fun out of teasing you.
whatever you know you love it
So did you want anything in particular to eat?
yeah i shoulda brought like a bento box or something right
isnt that the usual thing for this kind of situation
Yes Davesprite.
Any type of meal would be the “thing” for this “kind of situation”.
har har
but yeah i shoulda picked some up
that woulda been so classic
i guess i blew it
Can you eat normal food anyway?
Aren’t you some kind of part-bird… ghost… thing…
I’m still not really clear on your whole deal.
yeah i dunno actually
i never thought too much about it
i could really go for some birdseed now though
it sounds like it would really hit the spot
i wonder if they make birdseed bento boxes
Actually…
I already figured you might be into that kinda thing…
Since you’ve told me your part-bird, or mixed with a bird, or something like that.
So I kinda took the liberty of bringing you some birdseed!
If you don’t like it, you don’t have to eat it…
But maybe you could at least try it and see.
Umm… I hope that’s not too presumptuous!
wow
${slot:playerName}
this is…
I’m sorry, was this like…
Totally condescending?!
I mean, I know you’re a person, and not just a bird-thing…
no no no its not that
its not that at all
this is like
really really thoughtful
i cant remember the last time someone did something like this for me actually
thank you
Oh! Haha, well, it was nothing really.
I’ve just had a lot of fun hanging out with you…
You know, in spite of it all.
you know what
im not into this
...Oh… Sorry…
I was just teasing with the “in spite of it all” thing…
no you didnt do anything wrong
im just starting to feel really guilty
even if this is all just part of the game
youre like
really cool
really really cool…
you deserve way better than a freaky …sprite-thing like me
im not even a person and all i do is talk about a bunch of stuff that just seems like nonsense to you
i shouldve never led you down this romance path
Davesprite, for goodness’ sake!
How many times do I have to tell you?!
I’m hanging out with you because I WANT to.
yeah but i still led you on kinda
i mean i guided you into it with all my talk of getting the good ending and so on
i shouldve tried to guide you into failing with me instead
im the worst romance option in this whole game
you should have picked someone cool
Davesprite, I know you hate yourself because you think you’re just a “copy” of someone or whatever…
I don’t really get what’s going on with all that…
whoah who said i hate myself
i mean i totally do but
i didnt exactly say that…
But sometimes you get so insecure that it’s… almost hurtful, you know?
You’re saying I don’t have any real choices in my life…
That even the choice to spend time with you isn’t right.
Well, that’s what I chose for myself!
I don’t care if you don’t understand why I would hang out with someone like you, but…
${slot:playerName}…
...but I have my reasons, okay?!
Can you just forget that I’m a game construct or whatever for just a moment…
And be real with me?
Can you trust me when I say…
That I really like you?
And it’s not just because of some “romance path” I’m supposed to be on?
but what if
what if i tell you
that i really cant believe that
what would you say then
would you … hate me?
Well… it’s pretty frustrating, but…
I guess I’ll just have to try harder…
To get you to believe me.
(whoah ${slot:playerName} are you holding my hand right now
that is a smooth move
props yo)
Anyway… maybe I haven’t been fair to you.
huh?
hows that
Well, I’m asking you to trust and believe in me…
But I haven’t trusted or believed in you for even one second.
yeah but all my stuff sounds pretty crazy right
i dont exactly blame you on that one
So, let’s say, just for the sake of argument…
That I believe you.
I’m not saying I do, necessarily!
But if I did…
What happens next in the game?
oh thats an easy one
pacman gets kidnapped
Huh?
For real?
yeah by evil namco high
those guys are tools
Wait, you sound like you’re serious.
i am totally serious
pacmans gonna get kidnapped
its gonna be a total catastrophe
but its gonna probably be okay dont worry
i mean you gotta pick the right options but ill help you out with that
Wait, if you’re so sure Pacman’s gonna get kidnapped…
I mean, that’s terrible! Isn’t there anything we can do?!
sure its easy
just come find me after it happens
And then you’ll fight them with your game-breaking digital powers?!
haha no way that sounds hard
but since youve already done well enough on my path
thats probably enough to trigger a decent ending with me
so pacman will be rescued no matter what
which means all you have to do is come find me and pick me for your final choice thing
and we can just go mess around and not do anything in the final battle
since itll already be settled in the game by then
what we do wont actually matter
But if Pacman gets kidnapped…
I’ll want to fight to save him no matter what!
To just blow it off would be… so cruel!
not really because he gets rescued anyway?
dont you get it?
it doesnt matter
so we can just chill
cmon itll be fun
It matters to me!
Even if this is all just a game…
I believe my choices matter.
I believe my feelings matter!
I’m trying to meet you halfway here, Davesprite…
I’m saying I believe you that Pacman will be kidnapped…
Now you have to believe in me too!
Believe me when I say…
that fighting for the people we love will always make a difference!
well yeah i guess it does
except when it makes absolutely no difference
like in this scenario
Ugh… why am I even trying with you.
You’re so hung up on this ridiculous game thing…
You can’t let go of it, even for someone who’s trying so hard to connect with you…
im sorry ${slot:playerName}
what i said just now was unnecessary
just all this stuff is hard to reconcile sometimes
you know?
I need some time to think.
I’ll see you later, Davesprite…
Enjoy the birdseed.
If you’re programmed to enjoy it, or whatever.
dang
oh hey pacman
(maybe i should warn him about getting kidnapped
but it wont make a difference anyway)
Something on your mind, young orange thing?
yeah i think i might have just totally blown it
with this really cool friend of mine
which is pretty much par for the course for me
considering what an idiot loser i am
Yeah, maybe you… SHOULDN’T be true to yourself.
amen brother
want to get in on this birdseed?
Yes. Yes I do.
Never speak of this to anyone.
